# castai_cache_group (Data Source)

Retrieve CAST AI DBO Cache Group by ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the cache group.

### Read-Only

- `direct_mode` (Boolean) Direct mode for the cache group.
- `endpoints` (List of Object) Connection endpoints for the cache group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--endpoints))
- `name` (String) Display name for the cache group.
- `protocol_type` (String) Database protocol type. Values: MySQL or PostgreSQL.

<a id="nestedatt--endpoints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `endpoints`

Read-Only:

- `connection_string` (String)
- `hostname` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `port` (Number)
